entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
